item.title: ScanBool
item.description: {{ ScanBool Field }} Example type Favorite bool type Book struct { Favorite Favorite Read bool } type Query struct { Title string } var queryBook = sqlt.First[Query, Book](sqlt.Parse(` SELECT true {{ ScanBool "Favorite" }} , read {{ ScanBool "Read" }} FROM books WHERE title = {{ .Title }} `))
